definition: firearms (in historical context)/flintlock (old powder and shot firearm)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.chinese: 兵士们扳起火枪的枪栓准备射击。

sentences.english: This forerunner of the musket is capable of firing deadly volleys that can pierce armour.
sentences.chinese: 这些火枪的先驱者可以射出穿透盔甲的致命齐射。
近卫军火枪手能持续射击了。

sentences.english: He shook his head, shouldered the rusty firelock .
sentences.chinese: 他摇了摇头，掮上那支生锈的火枪。

sentences.english: I came here with the intention of requesting the uniform of a Musketeer.
sentences.chinese: 我来此的目的是想请您赐予我一件火枪手军服。
瞎眼的老鼠，火枪手，命运。

sentences.english: D'Artagnan, you want to be a musketeer. This is your chance.
sentences.chinese: 达达尼昂，你想成为火枪手？你的机会来了。

sentences.english: Sacrifice Ritual doesn't take effect on Rifleman Bug fixed.
sentences.chinese: 修正巫妖牺牲仪式对矮人火枪手无效的错误。

sentences.english: What was the name of the third musketeer?
sentences.chinese: 第三个火枪手叫什么名字？

sentences.english: The insurgents have robbed 28000 flintlocks, but lacks the ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 暴动者抢走了28000支火枪，但是缺少弹药。

sentences.english: Optimized the accuracy and the aiming system of the muskets to feel realistic.
sentences.chinese: 优化的准确性和瞄准系统的火枪感受到现实。

sentences.english: The early time uses in the flintlock bullet which the firearms launch many for the iron grain or the lead shot.
sentences.chinese: 早期用于枪械发射的火枪枪弹多为铁粒或铅丸。

sentences.english: While melee is important, the massed line of muskets is the key image.
sentences.chinese: 有时肉搏很重要，线形集结火枪是关键。

definition: big gun/cannon/artillery/one who talks big/trad. form 大炮 also used/CL:門|门[men2],尊[zun1]
Western (or Western-style) cannon of the Ming era
